meta.title: Tooltip
meta.description: Add custom BootstrapVue tooltips to any element. Tooltips can be triggered by hovering, focusing, or clicking an element.

arg.description: ID of element to append the tooltip markup when visible. Optional, defaults to the body

modifiers.name: top
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the top of the trigger element (default)

modifiers.name: right
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the right of the trigger element

modifiers.name: bottom
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the bottom of the trigger element

modifiers.name: auto
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip in the best fit place around the trigger element

modifiers.name: topright
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the top-right of the trigger element

modifiers.name: topleft
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the top-left of the trigger element

modifiers.name: bottomright
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the bottom-right of the trigger element

modifiers.name: bottomleft
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the bottom-left of the trigger element

modifiers.name: lefttop
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the left-top of the trigger element

modifiers.name: leftbottom
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the left-bottom of the trigger element

modifiers.name: righttop
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the right-top of the trigger element

modifiers.name: rightbottom
modifiers.description: Positions the tooltip on the right-bottom of the trigger element

modifiers.name: nofade
modifiers.description: Disabled the fade animation of the tooltip

modifiers.name: html
modifiers.description: Enables basic HTML in the title

modifiers.name: interactive
modifiers.description: Wether the tooltip should be user-interactive

modifiers.name: viewport
modifiers.description: Sets the boundary constraint to the viewport

modifiers.name: window
modifiers.description: Sets the boundary constrain to the window

modifiers.name: v-{variant}
modifiers.description: Sets the tooltip contextual color variant to `{variant}`

modifiers.name: d{###}
modifiers.description: The show and hide delay in milliseconds (where `{###}` is the value in milliseconds)

modifiers.name: ds{###}
modifiers.description: The show delay in milliseconds (where `{###}` is the value in milliseconds)

modifiers.name: dh{###}
modifiers.description: The hide delay in milliseconds (where `{###}` is the value in milliseconds)

modifiers.name: o{###}
modifiers.description: An offset value in pixels (where `{###}` is the number of pixels, defaults to 0. Negative values allowed)
